author: trawick
msg: When -B is specified, search for a host address in the
same family as the specified outbound interface.  If
impossible, fail at name resolution instead of bind().

author: stack
msg: HBASE-6363 HBaseConfiguration can carry a main method that dumps XML output for debug purposes
